alert.note: Alert for Boise Mountains; Camas Prairie; Southern Twin Falls County; Southwest Highlands; Upper Treasure Valley; Western Magic Valley (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 07 at 6:45PM MDT by NWS Boise
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Twin Falls, western Jerome, southeastern Elmore, east central Owyhee, Gooding and Camas Counties through 745 PM MDT... At 645 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Danskin Peak to near Blair Trail Reservoir to Twin Butte. Movement was east at 70 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Blowing dust may decrease visibility suddenly. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Glenns Ferry, Anderson Dam, King Hill and Deer Heaven Mountain around 650 PM MDT. Pine, Corral, Davis Mountain and Trinity Lakes around 700 PM MDT. Fairfield, Featherville, Mormon Reservoir and Flat Top Butte around 710 PM MDT. Hagerman, Buhl, Gunsight Peak and Kelly Reservoir around 720 PM MDT. Gooding, Wendell, Filer and Paradise Peak around 730 PM MDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Boise Mountains; Camas Prairie; Southern Twin Falls County; Southwest Highlands; Upper Treasure Valley; Western Magic Valley
